title: Customer Service & Bookkeeping Coordinator
job_overview:
We're looking for a detail-oriented and proactive Customer Service & Bookkeeping Coordinator to join our growing residential maintenance team. This hybrid role is essential for keeping communication, coordination, and operations running smoothly across clients, technicians, and internal teams.

Key Responsibilities:

Respond to client inquiries and manage the shared email inbox

Update job statuses and documentation across multiple client portals

Create work orders and relay accurate info to techs, dispatch, and management

Order materials for technicians and track deliveries

Monitor and follow up on open issues until resolution

Handle basic bookkeeping: invoicing, payment tracking, expense entry, and reconciliations

Maintain a high level of professionalism and responsiveness

Requirements:

Customer service, dispatch, or operations experience in a service-based industry

Strong communication and organizational skills

Tech-savvy: CRMs, spreadsheets, and client portals

Able to manage multiple tasks independently and efficiently

Bonus Points For:

Bookkeeping experience (QuickBooks or similar)

Familiarity with property management or field service software

Background in maintenance, construction, or service trades

Why Join Us:

Flexible remote/hybrid work

Supportive, fast-growing team

Real opportunity for growth in a mission-driven company
